class.message: If you change the Plugin database type, a Plugin restart will be necessary \n If you use MySQL make sure you have entered the credentials in the file %%file

The Plugin database type is now %%db
The Plugin database type already is %%db
%%arg %%prefixColoris an invalid argument, the valid arguments are %%args
